stakeholders.name: Individual Patients in Emergency Situations
stakeholders.description: End-users who require life-saving medical intervention during emergencies.

mission_perspective.value_derived: Improved survival rates through faster medical response
mission_perspective.success_criteria: Medical supplies arrive on time and in usable condition; telemedicine consultation is effective.

loss_exposure.description: Delayed or failed medical delivery could result in loss of life.
Integrity of medical supplies is compromised, reducing effectiveness.

stakeholders.name: Healthcare Providers
stakeholders.description: Hospitals, clinics, and emergency medical professionals who use the system to support patient care.

mission_perspective.value_derived: Enhanced patient outcomes through advanced medical response systems
mission_perspective.success_criteria: System integrates seamlessly with hospital workflows and delivers results on time.

loss_exposure.description: Breach of patient privacy damages trust and violates regulations.

stakeholders.name: Control Room Operators
stakeholders.description: Personnel responsible for monitoring and coordinating drone fleet operations.

mission_perspective.success_criteria: Minimal mission failure rates and optimal fleet utilization.

loss_exposure.description: Loss of system availability disrupts emergency responses.
Fleet coordination failure leads to cascading mission failures.

stakeholders.name: System Administrators
stakeholders.description: Technical team responsible for maintaining system software, hardware, and security.

mission_perspective.success_criteria: System uptime meets availability requirements; all security vulnerabilities are mitigated.

loss_exposure.description: Data breach results in regulatory penalties and reputation damage.

stakeholders.name: Maintenance Technicians
stakeholders.description: Personnel responsible for ensuring drones are operational and properly maintained.

mission_perspective.value_derived: Reliable drone operations and reduced mission failures
mission_perspective.success_criteria: No unexpected drone failures during operations.

loss_exposure.description: Compromised payload integrity due to drone malfunction.

stakeholders.name: Executive Management
stakeholders.description: Leadership team responsible for strategic direction and system funding.

mission_perspective.value_derived: Increased market share and trust in the system
mission_perspective.success_criteria: System operates without major incidents; complies with all regulations.

loss_exposure.description: Regulatory non-compliance leads to penalties and operational restrictions.
Reputation damage impacts market trust and investor confidence.

stakeholders.name: FAA
stakeholders.description: Federal agency responsible for regulating drone operations and airspace safety.

mission_perspective.value_derived: Reduced risk of collision and airspace disruption
mission_perspective.success_criteria: System adheres to FAA regulations and avoids incidents.

loss_exposure.description: Airspace safety violations result in collisions.

stakeholders.name: Pharmaceutical Suppliers
stakeholders.description: Suppliers of medical payloads, including medications, blood products, and equipment.

primary_needs: Secure and reliable chain of custody
mission_perspective.value_derived: Preservation of payload integrity and supply chain efficiency
mission_perspective.success_criteria: Payloads are delivered securely and on time to the drone fleet.

loss_exposure.description: Payload damage or theft disrupts supply chain operations.

stakeholders.name: Local Community
stakeholders.description: Residents in areas served by the drone fleet who may benefit from improved emergency response.

mission_perspective.value_derived: Improved emergency response capabilities in their area
mission_perspective.success_criteria: Drones operate safely without infringing on privacy.

loss_exposure.description: Privacy concerns due to onboard sensors.

user_success.description: Users can reliably achieve their goals through the system
user_success.evidence_of_success: High usage rates, positive feedback, goal achievement metrics

operational_success.description: System operates efficiently within defined parameters
operational_success.evidence_of_success: Stable operations, manageable workload, effective controls

regulatory_success.description: System maintains continuous compliance with all regulations
regulatory_success.evidence_of_success: Clean audits, no violations, proactive compliance

security_success.evidence_of_success: No successful compromises, threats detected and mitigated

behavioral_indicators: Users actively choose to use the system
Stakeholders express confidence in the system

critical_relationships.failure_impact: Users cannot achieve goals, operators cannot fulfill duties
Direct harm to users through system compromise
